column4: I downloaded the net-install cd and installed the minimum ubuntu system,  and have been hand selecting packages to install. I have the kde/gnome core packages installed, and everything is working fine, except for my sound
is there certain sound packages i should install>?
Are you attempting to use integrated sound from a nForce4 chipset?
Which chipset is on your motherboard?
: best way to tell?
lspci|grep Multimedia
: 00:11.5 Multimedia audio controller: VIA Technologies, Inc. VT8233/A/8235/8237 AC97 Audio Controller (rev 60)
Good. Now try: lsmod|grep snd_pcm
: snd_pcm_oss            42144  0
Good. Now run: alsamixer
Be sure to un-mute and turn up the volume for both Master and PCM channels
M toggles mute/unmute and the up and down arrows adjust the volume while left and right arrows change channels.
Did that fix the sound for you?
: So i turned up the volume on the Master channel in alsamixergui but still no sound
Did you also turn up the volume on the PCM channel and un-mute them?
: I did
You were on xubuntu, or am I confusing you with someone else?
; fresh net-install of ubuntu
then I do not know what is wrong, sorry.
: Thanks anyway
: I had Headphones muted. Everythings good now
d'oh!
Good thing it worked out. :)
